name: IARU - International Amateur Radio Union Region 1
headAddress: Registered Office c/o Baer Nutz AG
membership: IARU is the umbrella organization of national amateur radio federations throughout the world and actively participates in the ITU, IEC, CISPR and CENELEC.
goal: Since 1925 IARU (International Amateur Radio Union) has been the umbrella organization of national amateur radio federations throughout the world. The PRC, a committee of IARU Region 1 which comprises Europe, the Middle East and Africa, represents the interests of the amateur radio and amateur radio satellite services with relevant government bodies, primarily at EU and EEA level. For more information see here: http://www.iaru.org/
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives: EMC Directive, Radio Equipment Directive, Consumer Protection, Spectrum Management, Civil Protection
